attributes.comment:
I am an adoptive parent and I am asking you please to reconsider these changes.
Please do not increase the price of the adoption paperwork filed through your
office. We are adopting a beautiful girl from Guatemala. You can?t imagine how
beautiful our daughter is to us and how much we love her. It is costing so much
to get her home. The fees to your office have run us $685, and if we have to
get updated forms it will be even more. If I work the numbers right, the cost
with your new fee schedule will be $1660! That is well over twice as much, and
as much as I spend on groceries for about 5 months! I know so many people
taking out loans and saving everywhere they can to bring home their child.
Please do not make it harder on good people to help a child and bring joy to
their family.

I?m all for doing my part and I believe everyone deserves to be paid for their
work, but this really seems excessive. Please please try to find another way!
Thank you. --Adoptive Parent Alice Ross
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Alice Ross
